attributes.action: Demand a General Election, Theresa May was not elected by the people.
attributes.additional_details:
Your Vote Matters!

Get a vote for the leadership of the country that is not forced upon us.
attributes.background:
Theresa May will become prime minister but whom of the public voted for this? No one. 

Have a general election so the british public can decide what party will lead the UK through negotiations with the EU.

Theresa May Becoming prime minister is not democratically right.
